threads: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!
text: sigh, here we go, blaming migrants again instead of fixing the system that forces people into desperate situations. human trafficking & drugs are the real issues, not ppl seeking safety. let's talk about real solutions, not just scapegoating.
